meanings.definition: To give (money or help) in order to achieve or provide something together with other people.
meanings.sent1: She is contributing money to the charity event.
meanings.sent2: The team is contributing their time to help clean up the park.
meanings.sent3: By contributing to the bake sale, she made sure there were enough treats for everyone.
meanings.sent4: His hard work is like contributing puzzle pieces to complete a big picture.
meanings.sent5: The students are contributing their ideas to make the project successful.

meanings.definition: To help to cause or bring about.
meanings.sent1: The rainy weather is contributing to the flooding in the area.
meanings.sent2: Eating unhealthy food can contribute to weight gain.
meanings.sent3: His loud singing is contributing to the chaos in the classroom.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude is like contributing sunshine to brighten everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The lack of sleep is contributing to his grumpiness.
